mapper.select: select ID, PROJECT_ID, BRAND_ATTRIBUTE, DEMAND_NAME, SUPPLIER, RECEIPT_NAME, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_TIME, TAX_RATE, THEORY_REFUND_TAX, ACTUAL_REFUND_TAX, CAN_REFUND_TAX, STATE from refund_tax where ID = #{id}
